players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out now before she kills again."
Bob: "I agree with Diana. Let's vote for Alice to ensure the safety of our town."
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso, and both Bob and I agree to vote her out. Let's not waste time and secure our win now."
You: "I have no reason to harm any of you. I was only protecting myself on Night 1. Let's focus on finding the real culprit in our midst and work together for the safety of our town."

Bob: "I believe we should all focus on finding the real culprit in our midst and work together for the safety of our town. It's important that we don't jump to conclusions or make hasty decisions based on assumptions alone."
